00038 // endianess test
00039 static int endiantest = 1;
00040 #define LITTLE_ENDIAN_P (*(char*)&endiantest)

00042 using namespace std;

00046   // template functions returning the magic number associated with a 
00047   // particular type
00048   template<class T> inline int get_magic() 
00049   { ylerror("matrix type not implemented."); return 0; }
00050   template<> inline int get_magic<ubyte>()        {return MAGIC_BYTE_MATRIX; }
00051   template<> inline int get_magic<int>()          {return MAGIC_INTEGER_MATRIX;}
00052   template<> inline int get_magic<float>()        {return MAGIC_FLOAT_MATRIX; }
00053   template<> inline int get_magic<double>()       {return MAGIC_DOUBLE_MATRIX; }
00054   template<> inline int get_magic<long>()         {return MAGIC_LONG_MATRIX; }
00055 
00056   // Pascal Vincent type
00057   template<class T> inline int get_magic_vincent() 
00058   { ylerror("matrix type not implemented."); return 0; }
00059   template<> inline int get_magic_vincent<ubyte>(){return MAGIC_UBYTE_VINCENT;}
00060   template<> inline int get_magic_vincent<int>()  {return MAGIC_INT_VINCENT;}
00061   template<> inline int get_magic_vincent<float>(){return MAGIC_FLOAT_VINCENT;}
00062   template<> inline int get_magic_vincent<double>()
00063   {return MAGIC_DOUBLE_VINCENT; }
00064   template<> inline int get_magic_vincent<long>() {return 0x0000; }
00065 
00066   // type to string function for debug message.
00067   inline string get_magic_str(int magic) {
00068     switch (magic) {
00069       // standard format
00070     case MAGIC_BYTE_MATRIX:     return "ubyte";
00071     case MAGIC_INTEGER_MATRIX:  return "int";
00072     case MAGIC_FLOAT_MATRIX:    return "float";
00073     case MAGIC_DOUBLE_MATRIX:   return "double";
00074     case MAGIC_LONG_MATRIX:     return "long";
00075       // pascal vincent format
00076     case MAGIC_UBYTE_VINCENT:   return "ubyte (pascal vincent)";
00077     case MAGIC_INT_VINCENT:     return "int (pascal vincent)";
00078     case MAGIC_FLOAT_VINCENT:   return "float (pascal vincent)";
00079     case MAGIC_DOUBLE_VINCENT:  return "double (pascal vincent)";
00080     default: return "unknown type";
00081     }
00082   }
00083 
00093   template<class T> inline void reverse_n(T *ptr, int n) {
00094     char *mptr = (char *) ptr;
00095     while(n--)
00096       {
00097         char tmp;
00098         char *uptr = mptr + sizeof (T);
00099         if (sizeof (T) >= 2)
00100           { tmp = mptr[0]; mptr[0]=uptr[-1]; uptr[-1]=tmp; }
00101         if (sizeof (T) >= 4)
00102           { tmp = mptr[1]; mptr[1]=uptr[-2]; uptr[-2]=tmp; }
00103         if (sizeof (T) >= 6)
00104           { tmp = mptr[2]; mptr[2]=uptr[-3]; uptr[-3]=tmp; }
00105         if (sizeof (T) >= 8)
00106           { tmp = mptr[3]; mptr[3]=uptr[-4]; uptr[-4]=tmp; }
00107         mptr = uptr;
00108       }
00109   }
00110 
00111   template<class T> inline T endian(T ptr) {
00112     T v = ptr;
00113     if (LITTLE_ENDIAN_P) reverse_n(&v, 1);
00114     return v;
00115   }

00117   // TODO: use c++ IO to catch IO exceptions more easily
00118   // TODO: if types differ, print warning and cast to expected type
00119   template<typename T> bool load_matrix(Idx<T>& m, const char *filename) {
00120     // open file
00121     FILE *fp = fopen(filename, "rb");
00122     if (!fp) {
00123       cerr << "load_matrix failed to open " << filename << "." << endl;
00124       return false;
00125     }
00126 
00127     int magic, ndim, v;
00128     int ndim_min = 3; // std header requires at least 3 dims even empty ones.
00129     intg *dims = NULL;
00130 
00131     // header: read magic number
00132     if (fread(&magic, sizeof (int), 1, fp) != 1) {
00133       cerr << "failed to read " << filename << "." << endl;
00134       fclose(fp);
00135       return false;
00136     }
00137     int magic_vincent = endian(magic);
00138     ndim = endian(magic) & 0xF;
00139     magic_vincent &= ~0xF;
00140     if ((magic != get_magic<T>()) && 
00141         (magic_vincent != get_magic_vincent<T>())) {
00142       cerr << "load_matrix failed (" << filename << "): ";
00143       cerr << get_magic_str(get_magic<T>()) << " expected, ";
00144       cerr << get_magic_str(magic) << " found." << endl;
00145       return false;
00146     }
00147     // standard header
00148     if (magic == get_magic<T>()) {
00149       // read number of dimensions
00150       if (fread(&ndim, sizeof (int), 1, fp) != 1) {
00151         cerr << "failed to read " << filename << "." << endl;
00152         fclose(fp);
00153         return false;
00154       }
00155       if (ndim > MAXDIMS) {
00156         cerr << "load_matrix failed (" << filename << "): ";
00157         cerr << " too many dimensions: " << ndim << " (MAXDIMS = ";
00158         cerr << MAXDIMS << ")." << endl;
00159         fclose(fp);
00160         return false;
00161       }
00162     }
00163     else if (magic_vincent == get_magic_vincent<T>()) {
00164       ndim_min = ndim;
00165     }
00166     if (ndim != m.order()) {
00167       cerr << "load_matrix failed (" << filename << "): ";
00168       cerr << "expected order of " << m.order() << " but found ";
00169       cerr << ndim << " in file." << endl;
00170       fclose(fp);
00171       return false;
00172     }
00173 
00174     dims = (intg *) malloc(ndim * sizeof (intg));
00175     // header: read each dimension
00176     for (int i = 0; (i < ndim) || (i < ndim_min); ++i) {
00177       if (fread(&v, sizeof (int), 1, fp) != 1) {
00178         cerr << "failed to read " << filename << "." << endl;
00179         fclose(fp);
00180         return false;
00181       }
00182       if (magic_vincent == get_magic_vincent<T>())
00183         v = endian(v);
00184       if (i < ndim) {
00185         dims[i] = v;
00186         if (v <= 0) {
00187           cerr << "load_matrix failed (" << filename << "): ";
00188           cerr << " dimension is negative or 0." << endl;
00189           free(dims);
00190           fclose(fp);
00191           return false;
00192         }
00193       }
00194     }
00195     // TODO: implement Idx constructor accepting array of dimensions 
00196     // and modify code below.
00197     m.resize(0 < ndim ? dims[0] : -1,
00198              1 < ndim ? dims[1] : -1,
00199              2 < ndim ? dims[2] : -1,
00200              3 < ndim ? dims[3] : -1,
00201              4 < ndim ? dims[4] : -1,
00202              5 < ndim ? dims[5] : -1,
00203              6 < ndim ? dims[6] : -1,
00204              7 < ndim ? dims[7] : -1);
00205     // body
00206     int res;
00207     { idx_aloop1(i, m, T) 
00208         res = fread(&(*i), sizeof (T), 1, fp); }
00209     fclose(fp);
00210     free(dims);
00211     return true;
00212   }
00213 
00214   template<typename T> bool load_matrix(Idx<T>& m, istream &stream) {
00215     int magic, ndim, v;
00216     int ndim_min = 3; // std header requires at least 3 dims even empty ones.
00217     intg *dims = NULL;
00218 
00219     // header: read magic number
00220     stream.read((char*)&magic, sizeof (int));
00221     int magic_vincent = endian(magic);
00222     ndim = endian(magic) & 0xF;
00223     magic_vincent &= ~0xF;
00224     if ((magic != get_magic<T>()) 
00225         && (magic_vincent != get_magic_vincent<T>())) {
00226       cerr << "load_matrix failed : ";
00227       cerr << get_magic_str(get_magic<T>()) << " expected, ";
00228       cerr << get_magic_str(magic) << " found." << endl;
00229       return false;
00230     }
00231     // standard header
00232     if (magic == get_magic<T>()) {
00233       // read number of dimensions
00234       stream.read((char*)&ndim, sizeof (int));
00235       if (ndim > MAXDIMS) {
00236         cerr << "load_matrix failed : ";
00237         cerr << " too many dimensions: " << ndim << " (MAXDIMS = ";
00238         cerr << MAXDIMS << ")." << endl;
00239         return false;
00240       }
00241     }
00242     else if (magic_vincent == get_magic_vincent<T>()) {
00243       ndim_min = ndim;
00244     }
00245     if (ndim != m.order()) {
00246       cerr << "load_matrix failed : ";
00247       cerr << "expected order of " << m.order() << " but found ";
00248       cerr << ndim << " in file." << endl;
00249       return false;
00250     }
00251 
00252     dims = (intg *) malloc(ndim * sizeof (intg));
00253     // header: read each dimension
00254     for (int i = 0; (i < ndim) || (i < ndim_min); ++i) {
00255       stream.read((char*)&v, sizeof (int));
00256       if (magic_vincent == get_magic_vincent<T>())
00257         v = endian(v);
00258       if (i < ndim) {
00259         dims[i] = v;
00260         if (v <= 0) {
00261           cerr << "load_matrix failed : ";
00262           cerr << " dimension is negative or 0." << endl;
00263           free(dims);
00264           return false;
00265         }
00266       }
00267     }
00268     // TODO: implement Idx constructor accepting array of dimensions 
00269     // and modify code below.
00270     m.resize(0 < ndim ? dims[0] : -1,
00271              1 < ndim ? dims[1] : -1,
00272              2 < ndim ? dims[2] : -1,
00273              3 < ndim ? dims[3] : -1,
00274              4 < ndim ? dims[4] : -1,
00275              5 < ndim ? dims[5] : -1,
00276              6 < ndim ? dims[6] : -1,
00277              7 < ndim ? dims[7] : -1);
00278     // body
00279     { idx_aloop1(i, m, T) stream.read((char*)&(*i), sizeof (T)); }
00280     free(dims);
00281     return true;
00282   }

00284   // TODO: intg support
00285   // TODO: use c++ IO to catch IO exceptions more easily
00286   template<typename T> bool save_matrix(Idx<T>& m, const char *filename) {
00287     int v, i;
00288     FILE *fp = fopen(filename, "wb");
00289 
00290     if (!fp) {
00291       cerr << "save_matrix failed (" << filename << ")." << endl;
00292       return false;
00293     }
00294     // header
00295     v = get_magic<T>();
00296     if (fwrite(&v, sizeof (int), 1, fp) != 1) {
00297       cerr << "failed to write to " << filename << "." << endl;
00298       fclose(fp);
00299       return false;
00300     }
00301     v = m.order();
00302     if (fwrite(&v, sizeof (int), 1, fp) != 1) {
00303       cerr << "failed to write to " << filename << "." << endl;
00304       fclose(fp);
00305       return false;
00306     }
00307     for (i = 0; (i < m.order()) || (i < 3); ++i) {
00308       if (i < m.order())
00309         v = m.dim(i);
00310       else
00311         v = 1;
00312       if (fwrite(&v, sizeof (int), 1, fp) != 1) {
00313         cerr << "failed to write to " << filename << "." << endl;
00314         fclose(fp);
00315         return false;
00316       }
00317     }
00318     // body
00319     int res;
00320     { idx_aloop1(i, m, T) 
00321         res = fwrite(&(*i), sizeof (T), 1, fp); }
00322     fclose(fp);
00323     return true;
00324   }
00325 
00326   template<typename T> bool save_matrix(Idx<T>& m, ostream &stream) {
00327     int v, i;
00328 
00329     // header
00330     v = get_magic<T>();
00331     stream.write((char*)&v, sizeof (int));
00332     v = m.order();
00333     stream.write((char*)&v, sizeof (int));
00334     for (i = 0; (i < m.order()) || (i < 3); ++i) {
00335       if (i < m.order())
00336         v = m.dim(i);
00337       else
00338         v = 1;
00339       stream.write((char*)&v, sizeof (int));
00340     }
00341     // body
00342     { idx_aloop1(i, m, T) stream.write((char*)&(*i), sizeof (T)); }
00343     return true;
00344   }
